name: garnishing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
garnish
garnish verb [T]
(decorate food)
to decorate food with a small amount of different food: Garnish the dish with parsley before serving.

garnish verb [T]
(take money)
law
  US specialized to take an amount from someone's wages (= money paid every week to an employee) or bank account in order to pay back money they owe: The IRS may end up garnishing your wages for the amount due. Debt collectors can garnish funds from your checking account.
